name: fangun
description:
This is Parkour.

The theme of the game is very simple, you need to constantly jump over obstacles, run higher, and use your skills to run as far as possible!

Operating mode:

Automatic movement. The longer the time, the faster the automatic movement.

You need to react quickly to avoid obstacles!

Game features:

Highly free operation and gameplay to experience this different world

Cartoon game screen, rich and interesting playing methods

Complex terrain

The tense atmosphere of the game.

Fast paced experience

Click the mouse and operate accurately to make your character run farther!
